requirements.summary: Revert all frontend files to their Version 6 state, removing all changes from Versions 7–13 including z-index/overlay fixes and white background changes
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend files match the Version 6 snapshot exactly.
No code, styles, or logic from Versions 7–13 (including the z-index/overlay fixes and white background changes) remain in the codebase.
The application renders and functions as it did in Version 6.

file_operations.description: Revert routing configuration and component structure to Version 6 state, removing any route changes, layout modifications, or guard logic added in Versions 7–13.
Revert authentication guard component logic to Version 6, removing any modal handling, z-index fixes, or overlay behavior changes introduced in later versions.
Revert admin panel shell structure, sidebar navigation, profile dropdown, and mobile menu to Version 6 state, removing any z-index, overlay, or styling changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert public site shell including header, navigation menus, and footer to Version 6 state, removing any styling or structural changes from later versions.
Revert profile setup modal component to Version 6 state, removing any z-index fixes, overlay handling, or modal behavior changes introduced in Versions 7–13.
Revert stock item form dialog to Version 6 state, removing any form validation changes, styling updates, or modal behavior modifications from later versions.
Revert trial status banner component to Version 6 state, removing any styling changes, z-index adjustments, or behavior modifications from Versions 7–13.
Revert owner dashboard page to Version 6 state, removing any metric card changes, styling updates, or layout modifications introduced in later versions.
Revert stock management page to Version 6 state, removing any filtering changes, modal behavior updates, or UI modifications from Versions 7–13.

Revert home page hero banner, category grid, and trust indicators to Version 6 state, removing any background color changes (especially white background additions) or styling modifications from later versions.
Revert About Us page content, hero section, and card styling to Version 6 state, removing any white background changes or styling updates from Versions 7–13.
Revert Contact page layout and form styling to Version 6 state, removing any background or styling changes introduced in later versions.
Revert customer management page to Version 6 state, removing any UI changes, form modifications, or styling updates from Versions 7–13.
Revert profile page layout and form to Version 6 state, removing any styling or behavior changes from later versions.
Revert sales reports page including tabbed views and print functionality to Version 6 state, removing any UI or styling changes from Versions 7–13.

Revert global stylesheet to Version 6 state, removing any CSS custom property changes, color updates, component class modifications, gradient changes, white background additions, z-index adjustments, or other styling changes introduced in Versions 7–13.
Revert HTML entry point to Version 6 state, removing any metadata, theme color, or font preconnect changes from later versions.
Revert Tailwind configuration to Version 6 state, removing any color palette changes, custom property updates, font modifications, or shadow/animation changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert income tracking component to Version 6 state, removing any metric display changes or styling updates from later versions.
Revert low stock warning component to Version 6 state, removing any card styling or behavior changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert revenue overview component to Version 6 state, removing any summary card changes or styling updates from later versions.
Revert today's sales panel to Version 6 state, removing any summary or transaction list changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert trending stocks panel to Version 6 state, removing any list styling or card changes from later versions.
Revert trial status card to Version 6 state, removing any styling or urgency state changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert income page wrapper to Version 6 state, removing any layout or header changes from later versions.
Revert revenue page wrapper to Version 6 state, removing any layout changes from Versions 7–13.
Revert sales page wrapper to Version 6 state, removing any layout changes from later versions.
Revert trending page wrapper to Version 6 state, removing any layout changes from Versions 7–13.
